title: 4 Request For Auditor On Jail Numbers

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:
Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:
To Whom It May Concern:
Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Wednesday, December 13th 2023

1.	All records showing the number of CERTIFIED JAILERS and Certified Police Officers Employed
January the 1st 2002 until December 31st, 2002
January the 1st 2003 until December 31st, 2003
January the 1st 2004 until December 31st, 2004
January the 1st 2005 until December 31st, 2005
January the 1st 2006 until December 31st, 2006
January the 1st 2007 until December 31st, 2007
January the 1st 2008 until December 31st, 2008
January the 1st 2009 until December 31st, 2009
January the 1st 2010 until December 31st, 2010
January the 1st 2011 until December 31st, 2011

2. A list of all CERTIFIED POLICE OFFICERS that have quit or resigned from 01/01/2002 to 01/01/2012.

3. All documented income and/or loss of income from housing federal inmates.  At the Jack Harwell Detention Center for the years 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, and 2023. 

4. All overtime pay for Jail and Police Officers, and Sheriff Deputies for the years 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, and 2023. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available, or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.
Sincerely,
Bernadette Feazell

Bernadette Feazell

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
